channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: U.S. bipartisan lawmakers say the U.K. order gagging Apple from disclosing the demand is unconstitutional. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For...

item.title: Developer of Lockbit ransomware gets extradited to the United States
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice announced that Rostislav Panev, who developed code and maintained infrastructure for LockBit, is now in U.S. custody. ©...

item.title: Panasonic Arc 5 Palm Shaver Review: Japanese Steel
item.description: The compact palm-sized travel shaver is elegant and waterproof, and it feels like a river-washed stone. But it won’t shave the unkempt.

item.title: The Beef Tallow Skin Care Trend Smells Like a Scam
item.description: What happens when you swap your Vanicream for rendered cow fat? I tried it so you don’t have to.

item.title: Meta Tries to Bury a Tell-All Book
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg might be in his post-fact-checking-era. But that hasn’t stopped Meta from going after the author of Careless People.

item.title: Best Heated Blankets, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Stay toasty warm with our favorite electric heated blankets.
